title: Sam Darnold, Baker Mayfield, Andrew Luck, & the NFL helmet rule
itunes:title: Sam Darnold, Baker Mayfield, Andrew Luck, & the NFL helmet rule
description:
Colin discusses the faith the New York Jets have in QB Sam Darnold, why Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield and Baltimore Ravens QB Lamar Jackson are projects, not prospects, why Indianapolis Colts QB Andrew Luck will be fine, and more on the NFL helmet rule. Guests include Greg Jennings, Kevin Clark, and Jordan Palmer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
